evs.analysisunits
Class AggregationUnit

java.lang.Object
  evs.analysisunits.AnalysisUnit
      evs.analysisunits.AggregationUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProgressMonitorInterface, java.lang.Comparable
public class AggregationUnit
extends AnalysisUnit
implements ProgressMonitorInterface

An aggregation unit comprises a set of verification units for which spatial aggregation will be conducted. The verification units must refer to the same variable and time-series and have common verification parameter values.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

public java.util.ArrayList<VerificationUnit> getVerificationUnits()

Returns:

isPoolPairs

public boolean isPoolPairs()
Returns true if the aggregated metrics will be computed from pooled pairs, false for averaging metrics.

Returns:
true if the pairs will be pooled across locations

isStatDependent

public boolean isStatDependent()
Returns true if the verification units that comprise the aggregation unit are statistically dependent in space, false otherwise.

Returns:
true if the verification units are dependent, otherwise false.

isBootstrap

public boolean isBootstrap()
Returns true if the aggregated metrics will be boostrapped according to the options set for boostrapping in the component verification units, false to not conduct bootstrapping, regardless of the options set for the component units.

Returns:
true to conduct bootstrapping if set for the component units, false otherwise

the aggregation unit ID

deepCopy

public AggregationUnit deepCopy(boolean copyMetrics)
Creates a deep copy of the aggregation unit. Verification units are only shallow copied for consistency in case the VU is changed (thereby impacting the AU). The parameter copyMetrics is not used in this context.

Specified by:
deepCopy in class AnalysisUnit
Parameters:
copyMetrics - is true to copy any metrics associated with the object, false otherwise.
Returns:
a deep copy

hasVerificationUnits

public boolean hasVerificationUnits()
Returns true if the aggregation unit has two or more verification units set.

Returns:
true if verification units are set

                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Sets the verification units, removing all existing units.

Parameters:
verifUnits - the verification units

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

deleteVerificationUnits

public void deleteVerificationUnits(boolean fullyDelete)
Removes all verification units from the aggregation unit and updates any references in the verification units if required (i.e. fully deletes if true).

Parameters:
fullyDelete - is true to delete the associated references in the verification units

deleteVerificationUnit

public void deleteVerificationUnit(VerificationUnit unit,
                                   boolean balanceWeights)
Removes the specified verification unit from this aggregation unit. Optionally, any weights associated with the unit may be re-balanced to equality. If, after the update, only one unit is remaining, all units and weights are cleared.

Parameters:
unit - the verification unit to remove
balanceWeights - is true to balance the weights

setPoolPairs

public void setPoolPairs(boolean pPairs)
Set the status for pooling pairs (true) or computing averages of the metrics (false). Throws an exception if the bootstrap parameter is true and the input pooled pair status is false.

Parameters:
pPairs - is true to pool pairs across locations

setStatDependent

public void setStatDependent(boolean statDependent)
Is true if the verification units that comprise the aggregation unit are statistically dependent in space, false otherwise.

Parameters:
statDependent - is true if the units are dependent, false otherwise

setBootstrap

public void setBootstrap(boolean bootstrap)
If the input is true, the aggregated metrics will be boostrapped according to the options set for boostrapping in the component verification units, false to not conduct bootstrapping, regardless of the options set for the component units. Throws an exception if the input bootstrap parameter is true and the pooled pair status is false.

Parameters:
bootstrap - is true to conduct bootstrapping when set for the component units, false otherwise

setIDSepChar

public static void setIDSepChar(char sep)
Sets the ID separator character for placing between the river section ID and the time-series ID.

Parameters:
sep - the separator character

public void setAggregationID(java.lang.String aggregationID)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Sets the aggregation unit ID.

Parameters:
aggregationID - the aggregation ID
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

computeMetrics

public boolean computeMetrics(java.util.Vector<VerificationUnit> ref)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Attempts to compute a set of metrics associated with an analysis unit. Throws an exception if the pairs have not been set in each child verification unit or valid metrics have not been defined. Returns true if successful, false otherwise.

Specified by:
computeMetrics in class AnalysisUnit
Parameters:
ref - a vector of reference forecasts (may be null)
Returns:
true if the metrics were generated successfully
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
